solution_line_template: He lost {initial_bench}*{percent_lost}=<<{initial_bench}*{percent_lost}={weight_lost}>>{weight_lost} pounds from his bench
So his bench went to {initial_bench}-{weight_lost}=<<{initial_bench}-{weight_lost}={post_injury_bench}>>{post_injury_bench} pounds
After training it increased to {post_injury_bench}*{training_factor}=<<{post_injury_bench}*{training_factor}={final_bench}>>{final_bench} pounds
